name: Corkscrew Crusade
description:
Made in under 42 hours, Corkscrew Crusade is a simple drill-themed roguelike. Fight your way through four levels and a final boss, gathering randomly-generated weapons and healing items on the way!

Controls:

WASD - move around!

Mouse - look around!

Left click - use your item!

1/2/3 - select an inventory slot!

The music is not mine, it's all public domain from freemusicarchive.org. Specifically, from the artist Komiku's album "Poupi's Incredible Adventure"! Here's their page so you can check out their work, and there are more detailed credits included in a text file in this game's zip!
